title: Simulation Learning Based on Refutation Texts to Improve Box Plot Interpretation Errors

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic statistical concepts and fundamental principles of data visualization
context.additional_context: Providing interactive box plot simulations in VR environments. Operating periodic error diagnosis and feedback sessions throughout the training period

learning_goals: Learners can reduce the "area misinterpretation" error in box plots by over 80% after countertext-based learning.
Accurately explain the scientific meaning of box plot components (box, whiskers, median) in a simulation environment.
Complete a box plot interpretation project in VR simulation without errors using real-world datasets.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
